alert.note: Alert for Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 6:54PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN MADISON...COOK... LOWNDES...BROOKS AND SOUTHEASTERN COLQUITT COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM EDT... At 654 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Sparks to near Hahira to near Valdosta to near Statenville. Movement was southwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Park, Adel, Valdosta, Quitman, Moultrie, Hahira, Sparks, Lenox, I-75 At Exit 16, Moody Air Force Base, Remerton, Dasher, Morven, Berlin, Lee, Cecil, Ellenton, Reed Bingham State Park, Barretts, and Massee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
